During career path you will face the necessity of getting such information about you as an Employee and about your team members as a Manager. Moreover, to improve yourself and your team you need to know what to improve and how to find a way to grow as a professional. Feedback will help with all these questions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback is an important part of People Management practices in EPAM.
